Title: Laser Light Cannon
Writer: Rebecca Sugar (creator), Kat Morris, Rebecca Sugar, Matt Burnett (story editor), Ben Levin (story editor)
Actors: Zach Callison, Estelle, Michaela Dietz, Deedee Magno
Plot: Steven and his father, Greg, search for a light canon that is the only thing that can stop an extraterrestrial object from destroying Beach City.
